data.chText: 民意调查；民意测验
data.enText: an investigation of the opinions, behaviour, etc. of a particular group of people, which is usually done by asking them questions

data.chText: 最近的民意调查显示，有75%的调查对象支持这项计划。
data.enText: A recent survey showed 75% of those questioned were in favour of the plan.

data.chText: 民意测验显示…
data.enText: The survey revealed that…

data.chText: 进行一项民意调查
data.enText: to conduct/carry out a survey

data.chText: 测量；勘测；测绘
data.enText: the act of examining and recording the measurements, features, etc. of an area of land in order to make a map or plan of it

data.chText: 航空测量
data.enText: an aerial survey (= made by taking photographs from an aircraft)

data.chText: 地质勘察
data.enText: a geological survey

data.chText: （尤指为欲购房者所做的）房屋鉴定
data.enText: an examination of the condition of a house, etc., usually done for sb who is thinking of buying it

data.chText: 总体研究；全面评述；概述
data.enText: a general study, view or description of sth

data.chText: 现代音乐概述
data.enText: a comprehensive survey of modern music

data.chText: 查看；审视；审察
data.enText: to look carefully at the whole of sth, especially in order to get a general impression of it

data.chText: 次日清早我们查看了火灾的破坏情况。
data.enText: The next morning we surveyed the damage caused by the fire.

data.chText: 出门前他对着镜子把自己审视了一番。
data.enText: He surveyed himself in the mirror before going out.

data.chText: 总体研究；全面评述；概述
data.enText: to study and give a general description of sth

data.chText: 本章对欧洲政治的现状作了简略概述。
data.enText: This chapter briefly surveys the current state of European politics.

data.chText: 测量；勘测；测绘
data.enText: to measure and record the features of an area of land, for example in order to make a map or in preparation for building

data.chText: （对建筑物的）鉴定，检查
data.enText: to examine a building to make sure it is in good condition

data.chText: （对…）做民意调查，进行民意测验
data.enText: to investigate the opinions or behaviour of a group of people by asking them a series of questions

data.chText: 我们对500名吸烟者进行了调查，发现有超过四分之三的人愿意戒烟。
data.enText: We surveyed 500 smokers and found that over three quarters would like to give up.

data.text: examine ♦ review ♦ study ♦ take stock ♦ survey

data.chText: 以上各词均含思量、审查、调查、研究之义。
data.enText: These words all mean to think about, study or describe sb/sth carefully, especially in order to understand them, form an opinion of them or make a decision about them.
examine

data.chText: 指审查、调查、考查、考察：
data.enText: to think about, study or describe an idea, subject or piece of work very carefully

data.chText: 这些观点将在第10章作更为详细的探讨。
data.enText: These ideas will be examined in more detail in Chapter 10.
review

data.chText: 指复查、检讨，以进行必要的修改：
data.enText: to examine sth again, especially so that you can decide if it is necessary to make changes

data.chText: 政府将在今年晚些时候重新检讨形势。
data.enText: The government will review the situation later in the year.
study

data.chText: 指研究、调查：
data.enText: to examine sb/sth in order to understand them or it

data.chText: 我们将认真研究这份报告，然后再作决定。
data.enText: We will study the report carefully before making a decision.

data.chText: 用examine还是study？
为理解或帮助别人理解某事，如在书中探讨，用examine；为使自己理解某事，用study。
data.enText: You examine sth in order to understand it or to help other people understand it, for example by describing it in a book; you study sth in order to understand it yourself.
examine or study?
take stock (of sth)

data.chText: 指对情况加以总结、作出评估、进行反思：
data.enText: to think carefully about the way in which a particular situation is developing in order to decide what to do next

data.chText: 他该从旁观者的角度来反思一下自己的职业生涯了。
data.enText: It was time to stand back and take stock of his career.
survey

data.chText: 指总体研究、全面评述、概述：
data.enText: to examine and give a general description of sth

data.chText: 本章对欧洲政治的现状作了简略概述。
data.enText: This chapter briefly surveys the current state of European politics.
to examine/review/study/take stock of/survey what/how/whether…
to examine/review/study/take stock of/survey the situation
to examine/review/study/survey the evidence
to examine/review/study/take stock of/survey sth briefly/regularly
to examine/review/study sth carefully/systematically/thoroughly/fully/further
to examine/review/study sth closely/in depth/in detail

word_means: 做民意调查，进行民意测验

means: (尤指为欲购房者所做的)房屋鉴定
（对…）做民意调查，进行民意测验

ex.chText: 哪位验尸官将负责对这家人的死因进行调查？
ex.enText: Which coroner will be in charge of the inquest into the deaths of the family?

ex.chText: 对那名歌手死因的审理昨天开始进行。
ex.enText: The inquest into the singer's death began yesterday.

ex.chText: 警方决定对他的死因进行调查。
ex.enText: The police decided to hold an inquest into his death.

synonyms.bx: 指对死因的调查，尤指非自然死亡的原因。

ex.chText: 我听说政府将对此事进行调查。
ex.enText: I've heard that the government will hold an inquiry into the affair.

ex.chText: 公众要求对事故进行独立调查。
ex.enText: The public called for an independent inquiry into the accident.

synonyms.bx: 指为查明原因或获取信息而进行的调查。

ex.chText: 他正在研究那种疾病的病因。
ex.enText: He is doing research on the causes of the disease.

ex.chText: 对哮喘的最新研究已经有了一些令人关注的发现。
ex.enText: Recent research on asthma has produced some interesting findings.

synonyms.bx: 指为了获得新发现或验证某一设想而进行的细致认真的研究。

ex.chText: 我们对北京的居住条件作了一次调查。
ex.enText: We carried out a survey of the living conditions in Beijing.

ex.chText: 调查表明现在人们的预期寿命更长。
ex.enText: The survey shows that people now have a higher life expectancy.

synonyms.bx: 指以提问或问卷的形式对某一人群的观点或行为所开展的调查。

tr: the act of looking or seeing or observing
example: he tried to get a better view of it
his survey of the battlefield was limited
He appraised the situation carefully before acting
The police had been following him for weeks but they could not prove his involvement in the bombing

value.boxr_value: The noun is pronounced /'səːveɪ/. The verb is pronounced /sə'veɪ/, and can also be pronounced /'səːveɪ/ in meanings 2 and 6. 名词读作 /'səːveɪ/。动词读作 /sə'veɪ/。义项2和义项5亦可读作 /'səːveɪ/。

value.def: If you carry out a survey, you try to find out detailed information about a lot of different people or things, usually by asking people a series of questions.

example.ex: The council conducted a survey of the uses to which farm buildings are put...
example.tran: 市政会就农场建筑的使用情况进行了调查。

example.ex: According to the survey, overall world trade has also slackened.
example.tran: 根据这项调查，世界贸易整体上也有所放慢。

value.tran: 调查;民意调查;民意测验

value.def: If you survey a number of people, companies, or organizations, you try to find out information about their opinions or behaviour, usually by asking them a series of questions.

example.ex: Business Development Advisers surveyed 211 companies for the report...
example.tran: 企业发展顾问公司为此报告调查了 211 家公司。

example.ex: Only 18 percent of those surveyed opposed the idea.
example.tran: 被调查者中只有 18%的人反对该主张。

value.tran: 调查;对…作民意调查;对…进行民意测验

value.def: If you survey something, you look at or consider the whole of it carefully.

example.ex: He pushed himself to his feet and surveyed the room...
example.tran: 他站起来仔细打量整间屋子。

example.ex: He surveys American politics with a conservative world view.
example.tran: 他用一种保守的世界观审视美国政治。

value.tran: 总体研究;审视;全面观察

value.def: If you give something a brief survey or a quick survey, you look at or consider all of it quickly, but not in detail.

example.ex: ...a brief survey of some important books on astrology...
example.tran: 有关占星术的几本重要著作的简要概述

example.ex: He sniffed the perfume she wore, then gave her a quick survey.
example.tran: 他闻了闻她身上的香水味，然后又飞快地打量了她一眼。

value.def: If someone carries out a survey of an area of land, they examine it and measure it, usually in order to make a map of it.

example.ex: ...the organizer of the geological survey of India...
example.tran: 印度地质勘察活动的组织者

example.ex: The scientists conducted two aerial surveys followed by two ground surveys.
example.tran: 科学家们在两次地面勘测后又进行了两次空中勘测。

value.def: If someone surveys an area of land, they examine it and measure it, usually in order to make a map of it.

example.ex: Scarborough Council commissioned geological experts earlier this year to survey the cliffs.
example.tran: 斯卡伯勒市政会在今年早些时候委托地质专家对这些悬崖进行勘测。

example.ex: ...data relating to astronomy, astrology, surveying and navigation.
example.tran: 有关天文学、占星术、测量学和航海术的资料信息

value.def: A survey is a careful examination of the condition and structure of a house, usually carried out in order to give information to a person who wants to buy it.

example.ex: ...a structural survey undertaken by a qualified surveyor.
example.tran: 由一位有资质的房屋鉴定员所作的结构评估

value.tran: (通常指为欲购房者作的)房屋鉴定

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 inspection

value.def: If someone surveys a house, they examine it carefully and report on its structure, usually in order to give advice to a person who is thinking of buying it.

example.ex: ...the people who surveyed the house for the mortgage.
example.tran: 抵押贷款房屋的评估人员

value.tran: 对(建筑物)进行评估;鉴定;检查

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 inspect

example.ex: In more than 30 years of surveying he has never yet known a building to collapse because of subsidence.
example.tran: 他做房屋评估工作都30多年了，还从未听说过哪一座房子由于地基下陷而倒塌的。

trans: (由英国或爱尔兰政府资助的全国地形测量局所绘制的)全国地形测绘详图
